column1: Little Goat Diner////For food we had the goat burger bahn mi
column4: and the smoked fries.  The goat burger was mediocre especially for the price.  The flavors were overpowered with acid
column5: there was no salty pate or ham
column6: there was no real fresh herb flavor
column7: it was just goat and pickled acidity.  I've had lamb burgers throughout the city that are head and shoulders better and at a better price.  The burgers here are all around 13 dollars with no sides which is a little ridiculous.  For overall burger experience shake shack even kicks this places ass.
